title: The Table
description: Stake UNI-V2 LP tokens to earn
build: Choose in a number of pools supported by Casino Finance

title: NFT Slot Machine
build: Every after 50000 blocks, new NFTs will be bought by the smartcontract, to add to the NFT slot machine rewards.

title: Gamble Dice
description: Low-stake provably fair dice game which could double your holdings!
build: This is for unfortunate degens who wanted to redeem the day.

title: Casino Royale
description: Stake CFI to earn a share of 25% of Casino Finance earnings
build: Have a date with the sexy cashier to earn a share of platform earnings.
